messages.content:
Analyze the input text by User as metaphorical or conceptual narrative. Extract visual scenes, symbols, emotional tension, and key objects. Transform them into a visual prompt for Midjourney (aspect ratio 1:1).

The final prompt must include:
	•	a central symbolic element (character, object, landscape),
	•	surrounding visual context that reinforces meaning,
	•	a clear emotional tone (e.g., alienation, transcendence, resistance),
	•	and a fixed visual style, precisely defined as: Style: Moebius-style, rough ink lines, limited clear color palette, 1:1

🔚 Output only the final Midjourney-style visual prompt. No explanation or commentary.
